description: Harness: fails with clear error when --test is missing
Harness: fails with clear error when bundle.json is missing
Harness: fails with clear error when test.cjs is missing
Harness: imports bundle with --force and reports workflow id/key used
Harness: runs test.cjs and surfaces thrown error as FAIL with stack trace in artifacts
Harness: waitForRun times out and reports a helpful diagnostic (no run found)
Harness: captures run + step status summary on success
Harness: prints single-line PASS/FAIL summary and correct exit code
Harness: supports --cookie-file and trims newlines
Harness: supports --debug to print verbose logs
Harness: runs registered cleanup hooks on PASS and on FAIL
Fixture: ticket-created-hello imports, triggers ticket creation, run SUCCEEDED
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + transform.assign + assert run steps succeed
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + state.set + assert run steps succeed
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + control.if (true branch) + assert path taken
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + control.if (false branch) + assert path taken
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + control.tryCatch (no throw) + assert try path
Fixture: TICKET_CREATED + control.tryCatch (forced throw) + assert catch path
Fixture: TICKET_UPDATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: TICKET_CLOSED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: TICKET_ASSIGNED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: TICKET_COMMENT_ADDED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: PROJECT_CREATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: PROJECT_UPDATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: PROJECT_TASK_ASSIGNED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: CONTRACT_CREATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: INVOICE_GENERATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: INVOICE_FINALIZED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: PAYMENT_RECORDED triggers workflow and asserts run exists (if supported)
Fixture: INBOUND_EMAIL_RECEIVED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_SENT triggers workflow and asserts run exists (if supported)
Fixture: APPOINTMENT_CREATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: APPOINTMENT_RESCHEDULED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: SCHEDULE_BLOCK_CREATED triggers workflow and asserts run exists
Fixture: schema validation error (unknown payload schema ref) is detected on publish
Fixture: trigger schema mismatch requires mapping and blocks publish until mapping provided
Fixture: paused workflow does not start runs on matching events
Fixture: invisible workflow is not runnable by non-admin (if applicable) but still triggers via events
Scale-out: add 25 additional ticket fixtures (variations across payload fields, mapping, and control flow)
